name: 許鼎鈞
objective:
將試作技術課程內所習之試作技術應用發揮，以產品設計圖為依據，
應用各種材料及加工技術完成產品之立體表達。
To practice product model building techniques . 
Based on product engineering drawing , let techning design students to practice model making techniques with difference material and working methods .
